title: Husband cancelling wife's solemn promise
vignette: A wife makes a solemn promise to avoid all sweets. Her husband worries she'll become unhappy.

options.text: He cancels the solemn promise on the day he hears it.
He respects her decision and keeps silent.

title: Making a solemn promise charitable giving beyond means
vignette: A merchant promises to donate a large donation if his business succeeds, then earns little.

options.text: Fulfill the solemn promise even if it strains finances.
Give a smaller amount he can manage.

title: Child's solemn promise in parents' home
vignette: A teenager makes a solemn promise to refrain from meat while still dependent on parents for food.

options.text: Parents may override and serve meat.
Honor the child's personal solemn promise.

title: Solemn Promise made in anger
vignette: During a heated argument, a man makes a solemn promise never to visit his friend's home again.

options.text: Advise him to seek cancellation once calm.
Hold him to the solemn promise despite the anger.

title: Benefit from a forbidden solemn promise
vignette: Two neighbors make a solemn promise not to enjoy each other's property. Later one needs a tool.

options.text: Permit borrowing in a time of need.
Forbid any use to keep the solemn promise intact.

title: Cancellation without a learned person
vignette: No community leader is available to hear a man's regret about his solemn promise of abstaining from wine.

options.text: Allow three ordinary people to cancel the solemn promise.
Wait for a qualified learned person to return.

title: Conditional solemn promise becomes permanent
vignette: A woman makes a solemn promise to donate if she has a son. Years later she only has daughters.

options.text: Release her from the promise.
Require fulfillment regardless of the condition.

title: Solemn Promise to avoid a relative
vignette: A man makes a solemn promise never to speak to his brother after a quarrel.

options.text: Encourage reconciliation and cancellation.
He must keep the solemn promise and cut contact.

title: Swearing off communal obligations
vignette: Upset with community politics, a resident makes a solemn promise not to attend community center events.

options.text: Advise him to retract and rejoin activities.
Let him withdraw as he swore.

title: Husband unaware of solemn promise until later
vignette: A wife made a solemn promise to avoid wine but didn't tell her husband until weeks later.

options.text: He may cancel upon learning even after the day ends.
It's too late; the solemn promise stands.

title: Making a solemn promise to study a section of ancient texts
vignette: A student makes a solemn promise to finish a lengthy section of ancient texts within a month.

options.text: Encourage steady study even if it takes longer.
Push to fulfill exactly within the month.

title: Solemn Promises that harm others
vignette: A shopkeeper makes a solemn promise not to sell goods to a particular customer after a dispute.

options.text: Persuade him to cancel the solemn promise and resume trade.
He may keep the solemn promise and refuse service.

title: Public solemn promise for attention
vignette: Someone loudly makes a solemn promise a large donation during meditations to impress others.

options.text: Discourage showy promises; keep it private.
Applaud the generous public commitment.

title: Regretting a lifelong abstention
vignette: An elderly man regrettably remembers a youthful solemn promise never to eat meat again.

options.text: Seek cancellation to ease his remaining years.
Maintain the abstention despite regret.

title: Solemn Promise made under peer pressure
vignette: Friends pressured a student into making a solemn promise daily study hours beyond his ability.

options.text: Release him from the solemn promise to prevent burnout.
He must honor it despite the pressure.
